remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关格式设置选项的信息，请参阅键入概述。For information about formatting options, see the type overview. ## Examples 下面的示例显示如何使用 方法。The following example shows how to use the method. 此示例获取用户输入从配置为接受日期时间数据的字段模板。The example gets user input from a field template that is configured to accept date-time data. 在 DynamicData\FieldTemplates\DateTime_Edit.ascx.cs 或 DynamicData\FieldTemplates\DateTime_Edit.ascx.vb 文件中，该方法将空字符串转换为`null`。In the DynamicData\FieldTemplates\DateTime_Edit.ascx.cs or DynamicData\FieldTemplates\DateTime_Edit.ascx.vb file, the method converts empty strings to `null`. [!code-csharp[System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions/cs/DateTime_Edit.ascx.cs#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static void EnablePersistedSelection (this System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl dataBoundControl);
.method public static hidebysig void EnablePersistedSelection(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl dataBoundControl) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Sub EnablePersistedSelection (dataBoundControl As BaseDataBoundControl)
static member EnablePersistedSelection : System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl -> unit

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Use the EnablePersistedSelection property on a databound control such as GridView or ListView.")

param.name: dataBoundControl
param.span: The data bound control.

span.span: The data bound control.

summary.span: Enables selection to be persisted in data controls that support selection and paging.

span.span: Enables selection to be persisted in data controls that support selection and paging.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 扩展的控件中，并支持对所选内容，分页和排序，调用此方法使得控件可以保存所选内容，即使所选的行不可见。In controls that extend and that support selection, paging, and sorting, calling this method enables the control to persist selection even when the selected row is not visible. 例如，如果用户选择某一行，然后转至另一页上，或者如果用户对数据进行排序，所选的行处于选定状态。For example, if the user selects a row and then pages to another page, or if the user sorts the data, the selected row remains selected. 如果不调用此方法，所选内容会丢失，当用户分页或排序。If this method is not called, selection is lost when the user pages or sorts. 方法调用 。The method calls .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法扩展的当前实例的值并控制到`Where`可在数据源的查询中使用的参数。This method expands the values of the current instances of the and controls into `Where` parameters that are usable in queries by the data source.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Web.DynamicData.IDynamicDataSource FindDataSourceControl (this System.Web.UI.Control current);

summary.span: Returns the data source that is associated with the data control for the specified control.

span.span: Returns the data source that is associated with the data control for the specified control.

returns.span: The data source that is associated with the data control for the specified control.

span.span: The data source that is associated with the data control for the specified control.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何查找包含数据源控件。The following example shows how to find the containing data source control. 在示例中，动态数据网页模板复制到要为 AdventureWorksLT 数据库的 ProductDescription 表提供自定义显示的 \DynamicData\CustomPages\ProductDescriptions 文件夹中。In the example, the Dynamic Data page templates are copied to the \DynamicData\CustomPages\ProductDescriptions folder to provide a custom display for the ProductDescription table of the AdventureWorksLT database. Insert.aspx 文件标记更改为添加`OnDataBound`事件处理程序名为`DetailsView1_DataBound`，在其中调用方法来查找数据源控件。The Insert.aspx file markup is changed to add an `OnDataBound` event handler named `DetailsView1_DataBound`, in which the method is called to find the data source control. [!code-csharp[System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions/cs/Insert.aspx.cs#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions/cs/Insert.aspx#2)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何查找指定的列名称的文本框控件。The following example shows how to find the text box control for a specified column name. 在示例中，动态数据网页模板复制到要为 AdventureWorksLT 数据库的 ProductDescription 表提供自定义显示的 \DynamicData\CustomPages\ProductDescriptions 文件夹中。In example, the Dynamic Data page templates are copied to the \DynamicData\CustomPages\ProductDescriptions folder to provide a custom display for the ProductDescription table of the AdventureWorksLT database. Insert.aspx 文件标记更改为添加`OnDataBound`事件处理程序名为`DetailsView1_DataBound`，在其中调用方法来查找文本框控件。The Insert.aspx file markup is changed to add an `OnDataBound` event handler named `DetailsView1_DataBound`, in which the method is called to find a text box control. [!code-csharp[System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions/cs/Insert.aspx.cs#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions/cs/Insert.aspx#2)]
